amendment.description: To provide training for defense acquisition workforce on the requirements of section 2533a of title 10, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Berry Amendment ) and the regulations implementing that section.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1522 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1522 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S12778-12791) To provide training for defense acquisition workforce on the requirements of section 2533a of title 10, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Berry Amendment ) and the regulations implementing that section.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1522 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1522 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dole.
